snippet.title: The Huntsman: Winter's Curse™ Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Huntsman: Winter's Curse
Launching April 22, 2016
http://store.steampowered.com/app/446990
http://www.thehuntsmanmoviegame.com

Discover the world of The Huntsman through the expanded universe within The Huntsman: Winter’s Curse.  Desert Owl Games will soon release the episodic role-playing game, with collectible card game elements, inspired by Universal Pictures’ legendary saga.  The game will debut on Windows and Mac, with a PlayStation 4 release to follow later in 2016.

Set in a surreal animated world, The Huntsman: Winter’s Curse will deliver dynamic storytelling involving many of the characters from Snow White and the Huntsman and its upcoming prequel, The Huntsman: Winter’s War, in theaters April 22, 2016. As the plot unfolds, players will confront dangerous creatures and powerful sorcerers, battle evil men and even spar with Eric, the most elite Huntsman.

Players guide characters through the enchanted world of The Huntsman: Winter’s Curse, outwitting foes and directing the narrative through choose-your-own-adventure style decisions. As the story progresses, the party will sometimes be joined by a third member, including fellow humans, dwarves and supernatural beings.

For more on Desert Owl Games
http://www.desertowlgames.com/

For more on The Huntsman film
http://www.thehuntsmanmovie.com
